status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"717jd","text":"Collect the HeLa cells by trypsinization and wash the cell pellet with PBS once before cells are lysed in lysis buffer (100 mM KCl, 2.5 mM MgCl2, 20 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 0.5% NP-40).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":143,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdupu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8qm2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pfa4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["KCl","100 mM"],["MgCl2","2.5 mM"],["Tris-HCl","20 mM"],["pH","7.4"],["NP-40","0.50%"]],"guid":"5A1DD411B3C24D61982AC072DA21AB4A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["KCl","100 mM"],["MgCl2","2.5 mM"],["Tris-HCl","20 mM"],["pH","7.4"],["NP-40","0.50%"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48mo0","text":"Lyse the samples for     before cell lysates are cleared by centrifugation at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"20000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5b0el","text":"Protein concentrations of the cleared protein lysates are then determined with the Pierce Detergent Compatible Bradford Assay Kit (23246, Thermo Fisher) and equal amounts are incubated with beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tdm3","text":"Precoat the beads with GST (negative control), NIX-GST, or BNIP3-GST as described in the protocol for the microscopy-based bead assay. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nqte","text":"Incubate the HeLa cell lysates   with precoated beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5udin","text":"In the morning, wash the samples five times in lysis buffer before the beads are either submitted for analysis by mass spectrometry or for analysis by SDS-PAGE and western blotting by resuspending the beads in protein loading dye, supplemented with   DTT, and boiled for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":249,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":271,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":276,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1qecn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63f9v","text":"Note that for mass spec samples, the NP-40 is omitted from the washing buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f28b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C888AE27320711EF890F0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rk10","text":"Load the samples on 4-12% SDS-PAGE gels (NP0322BOX, Thermo Fisher) with PageRuler Prestained protein marker (Thermo Fisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ujpb","text":"Transfer the proteins onto nitrocellulose membranes (RPN132D, GE Healthcare) for  at  using the Mini Trans-Blot Cell (Bio-Rad). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfqa1","text":"After the transfer, membranes are blocked with 5% milk powder dissolved in PBS-Tween (0.1% Tween 20) for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu1n9","text":"Incubate the membranes   at   with primary antibodies dissolved in the blocking buffer, wash three times for 5 min, and incubate with species-matched secondary horseradish peroxidase (HRP)-coupled antibodies diluted 1:10,000 in blocking buffer for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":248,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":253,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebds7","text":"Wash the membranes three times with PBS-T and processed further for western blot detection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mshr","text":"Incubate the membranes with SuperSignal West Femto Maximum Sensitivity Substrate (34096, Thermo Fisher) and imaged with a ChemiDoc MP Imaging system (Bio-Rad). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
